item.title: Sen. Rand Paul does not want Vice President J.D. Vance to be the next president
item.description: Sen. Rand Paul said Sunday that he's not on board with efforts to name Vice President J.D. Vance as the heir apparent to President Trump.

item.title: Coast Guard is pursuing another tanker helping Venezuela skirt sanctions, U.S. official says
item.description: The U.S. Coast Guard on Sunday was pursuing another sanctioned oil tanker in the Caribbean Sea as the Trump administration appeared to be intensifying...

item.title: Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche says 'There is nothing' Trump is hiding in Epstein files
item.description: Deputy Attorney General Todd Blanche on Sunday disputed the narrative that the Department of Justice is redacting or withholding portions of sex traff...

item.title: Reps. Thomas Massie, Ro Khanna want to fine AG Pam Bondi until she releases all Epstein files
item.description: Reps. Thomas Massie and Ro Khanna said they are drafting an "inherent contempt" measure that would fine Attorney General Pam Bondi until she complies.

item.title: Trump to discuss housing, 2026 plans with administration officials at Mar-a-Lago after Christmas
